alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Jefferson; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 1:15PM CDT until April 13 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... Grant County in central Arkansas... Northeastern Dallas County in southwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas... Southeastern Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 115 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sheridan, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Sheridan... White Hall... England... Redfield... Altheimer... Prattsville... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Warbritton... Orion... Hensley Island... Dogwood... Cane Creek... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Sulphur Springs... Sherrill... Ain... Tucker... Pastoria... Wright... This includes Interstate 530 between mile markers 17 and 40, and near mile marker 46. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central, southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
